decreaseDefaults(uint256).details: The value "amount" should be standardized to WEI.

params.amount: The default amount that has been resolved.

returns.amount: The amount of net defaults in the system.

increaseDefaults(uint256).details: The value "amount" should be standardized to WEI.

returns.keeper: Equals "true" if address is a keeper, "false" if not.

params.asset: The asset (ERC-20) from which to standardize the amount to WEI.

returns.standardizedAmount: The above amount standardized to 18 decimals.

TLC().notice: Returns the address of the Timelock contract.

YDL().notice: Returns the address of the ZivoeYDL.sol contract.

ZVE().notice: Returns the address of the ZivoeToken.sol contract.

decreaseDefaults(uint256).notice: Call when a default is resolved, decreases net defaults system-wide.

defaults().notice: Returns the net defaults in the system.

increaseDefaults(uint256).notice: Call when a default occurs, increases net defaults system-wide.

isKeeper(address).notice: Returns true if an address is whitelisted as a keeper.

stJTT().notice: Returns the address of the ZivoeRewards.sol ($zJTT) contract.

stSTT().notice: Returns the address of the ZivoeRewards.sol ($zSTT) contract.

stZVE().notice: Returns the address of the ZivoeRewards.sol ($ZVE) contract.

standardize(uint256,address).notice: Handles WEI standardization of a given asset amount (i.e. 6 decimal precision => 18 decimal precision).

documentation.text: @notice Returns the address of the ZivoeRewards.sol ($ZVE) contract.
@notice Returns the address of the ZivoeRewards.sol ($zSTT) contract.
@notice Returns the address of the ZivoeRewards.sol ($zJTT) contract.
@notice Returns the address of the Timelock contract.
@notice Returns the address of the ZivoeYDL.sol contract.
@notice Returns the address of the ZivoeToken.sol contract.

@notice Returns the net defaults in the system.
 @return amount The amount of net defaults in the system.

@notice Returns true if an address is whitelisted as a keeper.
 @return keeper Equals "true" if address is a keeper, "false" if not.
@dev The ZivoeGlobals contract.
@dev The block.timestamp value of last distribution.
@notice Permission for owner to call pushToLocker().
@notice Forwards $ZVE available for distribution.

@notice This handles the accounting for forwarding ZVE to lockers privately.
 @param amount The amount of $ZVE to distribute.

@notice This contract facilitates an exponential decay emissions schedule for $ZVE.
         This contract has the following responsibilities:
           - Handles accounting (with governable variables) to support emissions schedule.
           - Forwards $ZVE to all ZivoeRewards contracts at will (stZVE, stSTT, stJTT).
